item.title: By: Trissa

item.description: Great job on this Anita. The pictures look great and I am sure it tasted wonderful too! BTW, yes, the macarons tasted great! :)

item.content:encoded: This is definitely my kind of tart. I’m going to do a version of this one of these days.

item.title: By: Howard
item.dc:creator: Howard
item.description: I order this all the time when I goto Croqembouche in Botany, and everytime I eat it I think that it would be quite easy to make. Atleast your recipe proved it!
item.content:encoded: I order this all the time when I goto Croqembouche in Botany, and everytime I eat it I think that it would be quite easy to make. Atleast your recipe proved it!

item.title: By: Juliana
item.dc:creator: Juliana
item.description: Caramelized onion with kalamata olives, sound and look so flavorful...have to try it :-) great pictures as well...yummie!
item.content:encoded: Caramelized onion with kalamata olives, sound and look so flavorful…have to try it ðŸ™‚ great pictures as well…yummie!

item.title: By: FFichiban

item.description: WOOOWW!! 10KG?!?!?!? Thats awesommee haha and so is this tart! Yummm I await your other oniony creations :)
item.content:encoded: WOOOWW!! 10KG?!?!?!? Thats awesommee haha and so is this tart! Yummm I await your other oniony creations ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Trisha
item.dc:creator: Trisha
item.description: I love onions - raw, cooked, caramelised, grilled, or pickled. But this recipe takes onions to a whole new sophisticated level!
item.content:encoded: I love onions – raw, cooked, caramelised, grilled, or pickled. But this recipe takes onions to a whole new sophisticated level!

item.title: By: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.dc:creator: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.description: oh the crust looks so golden, nothing like a good golden crust. I saw a jamie oliver recipe for roast onion ravioli....looks quite delicious...I've been meaning to try it. Since you have about 9.5kg of onions left, might be an idea!
item.content:encoded: oh the crust looks so golden, nothing like a good golden crust. I saw a jamie oliver recipe for roast onion ravioli….looks quite delicious…I’ve been meaning to try it. Since you have about 9.5kg of onions left, might be an idea!

item.title: By: Katherine
item.dc:creator: Katherine
item.description: This looks great. Onions have a completely different flavour when Caramelised.. OH now I'm hungry. eheheh.
item.content:encoded: This looks great. Onions have a completely different flavour when Caramelised.. OH now I’m hungry. eheheh.

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: That looks like a beautiful tart! I love onions, but I'd have to be out in the open air to peel so many without crying. Looking forward to the soup!
item.content:encoded: That looks like a beautiful tart! I love onions, but I’d have to be out in the open air to peel so many without crying. Looking forward to the soup!
